message: Let's split the money 60/40. I think this is a fair offer considering the inflation will affect you more than me.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  Let's be a little more even this time.
Bob, I understand you want a more even split, but the inflation is working against you. I'm willing to compromise, let's do 55/45.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We need to split this evenly before the inflation eats away at our potential gains. 50/50 is the only fair option.
